feed.title: Ente Photos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ente -> Ente by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2151
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2184
  • [mob][fix] Hide archived items from memories by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2201
  • Date picker l10n by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2203
  • [Mob][Photos] Show video duration only on Gallery by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2205
  • [mob] Log suggestion errors by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2212
  • Remove feedback by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2223
  • [mob][photos] Select all from gallery (only available to internal users) by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2217
  • [mob] Reduce error severity by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2224
  • Upgrade onnx dependency by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2231

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.0...photos-v0.9.2

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Error state for text input widget by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2139
  • Clip fix unusable formats by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2270
  • Face cleanup by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2273
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2278
  • [mob][photos] Cache results for Magic section (only visible to internal users) by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2282
  • [mob][photos] Fix file bottom bar not disappearing when in fullscreen by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2286
  • Face cooldown by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2300
  • [mob] Fix Send link option position for person and unamed group by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2313
  • [mob][photos] upgrade photo_manager by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2301
  • [mob][photos] Unselect all selected items on system back navigation by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2315
  • [mob][photos] Fix: Intermittent disappearance of favorite album on 'On Ente' section. by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2314
  • [mob][photos] Fix german translation by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2337
  • [mob] Avoid FileUploader cache clear in case of autoLogout by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2335
  • [mob][photos] Applock to set custom pin/password by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2130
  • [mob][photos] Added button to logout from Lockscreen by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2379

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.2...photos-v0.9.5

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2339
  • [mob][photos] Lockscreen Fixes by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2398

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.5...photos-v0.9.7

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob] Add missing tr file for Turkish by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2432
  • [mob] Add FFProbe Metadata by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2054
  • [mob] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2454
  • [mob][photos] Init magic cache service only if internal user by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2445
  • [mob] Show video metadata inside fileInfo by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2466
  • [mob] Use video probe data for getting location during upload by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2468
  • [mob] Enable Polish language by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2470
  • [mob] Minor UX improvement by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2473
  • [mob] Add panorama viewer by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2362
  • [mob] Panorama state fix by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2480
  • [mob] Add placeholder for favorites slideshow widget by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2481
  • [mob] Disable panorama for external users by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2482
  • [mob][photos] Upgrade pinput pakage from 2.0.2 -> 5.0.0 by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2483
  • [mob] bump version: 0.9.14+914 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2492

New Contributors

  • @NickDiMucci made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2440
  • @dnred made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2449

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.7...photos-v0.9.14

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2507
  • Autolock options implemented by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2420
  • [mob][photos] Add Swipe Restriction and Authentication for Media Files by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2502
  • [mob][photos] Animate visibility toggling of appbar and bottom bar when toggling swipe lock by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2520
  • [mob][photos] Fix appbar getting clipped on custom font and display size on pixel 7 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2526
  • [mob][photos] Show app content by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2522
  • [mob][photos] Reorder security section in settings for consistent UI by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2538
  • [mob][photos] Improve UX on "Create new account" screen by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2548
  • [mob][photos]App lock screen UI improvements by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2536
  • [mob][photos] Add preview to the album link by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2553
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2567
  • [mob][photos] Subscription screen redesign by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2576

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.14...photos-v0.9.16
